forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 38F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 40F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
